original_title: 12年間親代わりに育ててきた可愛い妹が結婚すると聞いて、僕は嫉妬に狂い中出ししてしまった。 白桃はな
overview: My parents got divorced when I was young, and my mother took us in, but she quickly made a new man and left. For the next 12 years, I forgot about his future dreams and love affairs and was absorbed in raising his sister. Her junior high school, ● school, university, member of society, her sister, who always thought she was a child, became an adult and came to greet her boyfriend with her marriage registration in one hand. To think that her little sister, whom she had raised with so much care, would become the property of a man she didn't know with just a piece of paper. I will never allow marriage, the flower is mine only...
title: I Heard My Adorable Younger Step Sister Who I Took Care Of For 12 Years Was Getting Married And Fucked Her Raw Out Of Jealousy Hana Shirato
